title: Clorofila
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Juice bar, Dominican, Latin American
description: Vegan cafe opened in 2015 next to Voodoo Lounge. Owned by Papo, a local community leader who runs a jujitsu school for local children. In addition to a variety of fresh juices, there is a lunch du jour which might be lentil dal, guacamole, and pan fried potatoes.
